title: Help Me Recover
body: Hi!I'm having trouble in my account,someone hacked it and change the email address of it.It is being use by a random person.I hope you could help me get my account back.

replies.body: We'd like work with you on your specific issue individually, and help recover the account.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or submit an email to support@riotgames.com.  In the mean time, I suggest using our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help secure anything else you might have outside of league as well.  We'll respond to the ticket as soon as we can!
